11.content:
Alex is on a picnic with his family when he sees a white rabbit hopping away. The rabbit is saying something...

"I'm late! I need to go potty!"

Alex gets up and waddles away towards the rabbit. Soon, he disappears, and Alex looks into a hole that he could have gone through when he starts falling!

"Ahhhhh!"

The toddler lands softly, however, and begins to look around.

Alex thought he could smell tea coming from the west, so he went off to investigate.

He skipped along, admiring the view, until he found a small house, in front of which was a table that was set to accommodate many people, but only three were sitting there.

One of them was a man wearing a large coat and a very large top hat.
The other was a hare about the size of Alex himself, wearing a suit.
And the third was a dormouse who was regular-sized but also wearing clothes and who was asleep.

What does Alex do?

11412.content:
When Alice followed the rabbit prints, she found the rabbit crying.
"What's wrong?' she asked.
"My training pants are wet!" said the rabbit.
"Oh, so how old are you?" said Alice, surprised that this wasn't an adult rabbit.
"Three," said the rabbit.
"Oh, that's how old I am," said Alice, "But where I come from, rabbits don't talk or wear clothes, and they stop growing when they're about your size. Also, it only takes a year for them to grow up."
"How bizarre," said the rabbit.

13.content:
Once upon a time there were three-year-old twins named Alex and Alice.
They were sitting in the garden listening to their older sister Fiona reading to them but both found the story a bit boring because nobody talked to one another and there were no pictures.

Then, they saw a rabbit wearing a waistcoat and trousers.
Fiona didn't seem to notice, she was looking squarely at the book, and when they tried to get her attention, she assumed they were playing a game.

"I'm late! I'm late!" shouted the rabbit looking at his watch, "And I need to go potty!".
This made the twins giggle and they ran after him, down a rabbit hole.

What happens when they land?
13.title: Both!

info.brief_description: A toddler finds themselves in a very potty Wonderland, featuring colorful people...
info.description:
When a toddler follows a white rabbit saying "I'm late! I need to go potty!" into a strange hole, they find themselves in a wonderland of the potty.

1: Keep it clean and child-friendly. Nothing sexual, violent or fetishistic.
2: Try to maintain continuity.
3: Don't stress, this is a fun, relaxed thing.
